amendment.description: An amendment numbered 81 printed in Part B of House Report 118-272 to transfer funds from the Department of Education to the Office of the Inspector General to combat Waste, Fraud, and abuse.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A032) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A032) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A032) Agreed to by voice vote.
